fact_check_explanation_title: This is not a photo of people seeking asylum in England
fact_check_explanation_summary: The photo was taken in Germany before the coronavirus pandemic.

fact_check_explanation_title: A Lee Rigby charity football Facebook page was taken down due to a hacking attempt
fact_check_explanation_summary: Facebook said that the page has now been reinstated.

fact_check_explanation_title: mRNA vaccines are being developed for Covid-19, but they do not change your DNA
fact_check_explanation_summary: mRNA works by instructing cells, not altering DNA.

fact_check_explanation_title: Gavin Williamson did not say pupils will be overpromoted into jobs that are beyond their competence
fact_check_explanation_summary: Comments about A-level results incorrectly attributed to the Education Secretary have been widely shared.

fact_check_explanation_title: Can children be detained without their parents’ consent if the authorities think they have coronavirus?
fact_check_explanation_summary: The government has said a parent, carer or legal guardian must be present for a Covid-19 screening to take place on a child under the Coronavirus Act, but the law …

fact_check_explanation_title: An Express headline on how many working carers fear for their job is flawed
fact_check_explanation_summary: The poll it’s based on didn’t ask if people thought they would get sacked, it asked if they thought they would be forced to leave their jobs.

fact_check_explanation_title: There is no proof you’re more likely to get Covid-19 if you’re tall
fact_check_explanation_summary: It was widely reported that a survey showed men over six foot tall are more likely to be infected with coronavirus. However, the research does not prove this.

fact_check_explanation_title: You were more likely to catch Covid-19 in Spain than the UK in late July.
fact_check_explanation_summary: A viral Facebook post claims Spain had a much lower Covid-19 death toll than the UK at the end of July. That’s correct but isn’t the best way to compare …

fact_check_explanation_title: The RSPCA has said that they are worried people will abandon pets because the economic effects of Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: The company said in a press release that they are worried the current economic climate would lead to more abandoned pets.

fact_check_explanation_title: Leicester residents are not being forcibly tested for coronavirus
fact_check_explanation_summary: Leicester City Council said that no one is being forced by them to take Covid-19 tests.

fact_check_explanation_title: These figures for the size of House Of Commons, House of Lords, and the EU parliament are all correct
fact_check_explanation_summary: However, the European Union does have lawmakers that aren’t elected by the public.

fact_check_explanation_title: How to check coronavirus cases near you
fact_check_explanation_summary: Local coronavirus case data is easy to find, but needs to be read carefully
